short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 2DAY Desktop Screen Share extension for Audio and Video Conferencing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 2DAY Audio and Video Conferencing with screen share feature for Online Collaboration. This download will install and enable you to screen share your desktop over Video Conferencing session with your participants. Your presentations and demonstration on desktop will be shown to your meeting participants. Please refer to www.2day.sg for more information.
